# Pull Request

## Design Quality Checklist

### Visual Design

- [ ] Matches reference image exactly (attach screenshot comparison)
- [ ] Uses design tokens (no hardcoded colors/spacing)
- [ ] Responsive on all breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop)
- [ ] Hover states implemented
- [ ] Loading/error/empty states implemented
- [ ] Animations smooth (60fps)

### Component Quality

- [ ] No duplicate components created
- [ ] Reuses existing UI components from `@eventfit/ui`
- [ ] Proper TypeScript types (no `any`)
- [ ] Accessibility attributes (ARIA labels, keyboard nav)
- [ ] Performance optimized (images, code splitting)

### Code Quality

- [ ] Follows component structure guidelines
- [ ] Clean, readable code
- [ ] Proper error handling
- [ ] No console.logs or debug code
- [ ] ESLint passes
- [ ] TypeScript type-check passes

### Testing

- [ ] Visual regression tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Storybook stories updated (if component changed)
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Cross-browser tested (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
